aboutUs.subTitle: - making cryptocurrency available to everyone since 2014
whoAreWe.text1: ObmenAT24 is a financial supermarket that provides comprehensive solutions in the field of cryptocurrencies and electronic money
whoAreWe.text2: Despite the imperfection of the legislative framework for cryptocurrencies and electronic payment systems, we have been successfully helping our clients solve a number of important business tasks for more than 7 years.
historyOfDevelopment.text: Our company appeared on the wave of the emergence of the crypto industry in Ukraine and in just a few years has become international. Following the growing needs of our audience, we added one service after another - new currency pairs, new exchange opportunities appeared.
text1: We are building a global product to provide financial services around the world, providing opportunities for any payments and transfers, savings, savings and investments, raising capital and transforming existing financial mechanisms into digital ones.
text2: We believe in the financial freedom of every individual and oppose restrictions on the movement and use of personal funds.
text3: Your savings must belong to you, be available to you anywhere in the world without restrictions.
